name: cucumber-java-easy-runner
description: VS Code extension for easily running Cucumber Feature files in Java projects - v26.2: Fixed Feature-level execution UI sync

cucumberJavaEasyRunner.enableCodeLens.description: Enable CodeLens buttons in feature files. When disabled, use Test Explorer instead for a cleaner interface.

cucumberJavaEasyRunner.executionMode.description: Execution mode: 'java' for direct Java execution, 'maven' for Maven test execution (supports multi-module projects, recommended)

cucumberJavaEasyRunner.testClassName.description: Test class name for Maven execution mode (e.g., MktSegmentCriteriaUpdateTest). Leave empty for auto-detection.

cucumberJavaEasyRunner.mavenArgs.description: Additional Maven arguments (e.g., '-X' for debug, '-e' for errors)

cucumberJavaEasyRunner.mavenProfile.description: Maven profile to activate (e.g., 'dev', 'test'). Leave empty to use default profile.

cucumberJavaEasyRunner.customGluePath.description: Custom glue path (e.g., 'com.example.steps'). Leave empty for auto-detection.

cucumberJavaEasyRunner.environmentVariab.description: Environment variables to set when running tests (e.g., {"ENV": "test", "DB_URL": "localhost"})

cucumberJavaEasyRunner.rememberTestClass.description: Remember the test class used for each feature file to avoid re-entering it

cucumberJavaEasyRunner.showStepResults.description: Show real-time step execution results during test runs

cucumberJavaEasyRunner.autoCompileBefore.description: Automatically compile project before running tests (mvn compile test-compile). Default: false (user compiles manually for better performance)

cucumberJavaEasyRunner.cucumberTags.description: Cucumber tags filter (e.g., '@smoke and not @slow'). Leave empty to run all scenarios.

cucumberJavaEasyRunner.debug.enabled.description: Enable debug support for Cucumber tests

cucumberJavaEasyRunner.debug.port.description: Default debug port (will auto-increment if occupied)

cucumberJavaEasyRunner.debug.timeout.description: Timeout for debugger attach in milliseconds

cucumberJavaEasyRunner.debug.suspend.description: Suspend execution until debugger is attached (suspend=y)

cucumberJavaEasyRunner.debug.requestMode.description: Debug request mode: 'attach' (recommended, v16 enhanced) or 'launch' (experimental, may not work with complex projects)

cucumberJavaEasyRunner.debug.sourcePaths.description: Source code paths for debugging (relative to workspace root)

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
